title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 938/98 of 4 May 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 2931/95 amending Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 and other regulations as a result of the amendment of the Combined Nomenclature for certain milk products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 938/98 of 4 May 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 2931/95 amending Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 and other regulations as a result of the amendment of the Combined Nomenclature for certain milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The seventh indent of Article 1(4) of Regulation (EC) No 2931/95 is hereby replaced by the following:
'- the information relating to CN codes ex 2101 10 and 2101 20 is replaced by the following:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
